mapper.select: SELECT emp_id AS empId, photo_url AS photoUrl, join_date AS joinDate, mobile, salary FROM TB_EMPLOYMENT_INFO WHERE emp_id = #{emp_id}
SELECT (SELECT e.emp_name FROM TB_EMPLOYMENT_INFO e WHERE e.emp_id = n.emp_id) AS empName, n.creation_date AS creationDate, n.title, n.content FROM TB_NOTICES n WHERE n.dept_code = #{dept_code}
SELECT in_time AS inTime, out_time AS outTime FROM TB_ATTENDANCE WHERE emp_id = #{emp_id} AND today = #{today}

SELECT am.title, am.attendance_type_code AS attendanceTypeCode, am.start_date AS startDate, am.end_date AS endDate, am.assign_code AS assignCode, am.reason, a.attendance_type_name AS attendanceTypeName, ast.assign_name AS assignName FROM TB_ATTENDANCE_MANAGEMENT am LEFT JOIN TB_ATTENDANCE_TYPE_INFO a ON am.attendance_type_code = a.attendance_type_code LEFT JOIN TB_ASSIGN_STATUS_TYPE_INFO ast ON am.assign_code = ast.assign_code WHERE am.emp_id = #{emp_id}
